file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 79-11-01-03 - OIL TANK - SERVICING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL OIL TANK - SERVICING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to drain the oil from the Oil Tank. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 79-11-01-600-801-A OIL TANK - SERVICING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 79-11-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 79-11-01-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. OIL TANK - SERVICING A. General (1) To do the task, see the instructions contained in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower cowling LH Engine 423 Lower cowling RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 79-11-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them. • START 1/2. (2) Put the workstand in the work area. (3) Open the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400) to get access to the engine oil tank. J. Tank Oil Drain SUBTASK 680-002-A (1) Drain the oil tank. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A CAUTION: MAKE SURE THAT THE LATCHES OF THE ENGINE SERVICING DOOR ARE CORRECTLY CLOSED. IF THE DOOR LATCHES ARE NOT CORRECTLY CLOSED, THE ACCESS PANEL MAY OPEN DURING THE FLIGHT. (1) Close the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the workstand. (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them. • START 1/2. (4) Refer to the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 to do the related check after an engine LRU maintenance procedure, as applicable.
